column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////So why 3 stars? For a table of five
column2: we were obnoxiously cramped. The table was too small and our seats kept hitting other guests so much to the point that my friend continuously had to turn around and ask the guy to stop bumping her. Plus the menus are ginormous and knocked over a glass of my sangria (pre-drinking
column3: mind you). The size really bothered me for awhile
column4: but I got over it. With that said
column5: I really enjoyed this place. Solid food
column7: and made for a great night out. I'd recommend
column8: although there are a few better tapas places to his before Cafe Ba Ba Reeba.
